QuestData.Title: The Trainer's Challenge: Qua-Ro Whitebrow
QuestData.Description: Qua-Ro Whitebrow is commonly considered the best student of the Order.$B$BHe seems quite without weakness. He is quick of intellect, strong of arm, hard-working, and talented.$B$BWhen you face him in the training ring, you will be testing yourself against our best.$B$BSpeak to him to begin the duel. No matter the outcome, you will learn much from challenging him.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Qua-Ro Whitebrow, then defeat him.
